CommentBody:
The AIC is not showing lockouts. We also don't see the activity in Activity Monitor despite seeing it in the NEA AD Activity Lockout report (not the deprecated lockout job)

- Does the lockout activity could as "authentication" or an attribute change?
--- Do auths need to be imported to the AIC?

- Why don't we see the lockout in activity monitor?

Screenshots added to SP.

To achieve this in AIC - need a feature request
Alternate approach - use NTM reporting
